org.middleheaven.chart
Interface Series

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSeries, BidimensionalSeries, TridimensionalSeries
public interface Series

A indexable, multi-dimensional set of values

Method Summary
 void addSeriesListener(SeriesListener listener)
          Add a series listener that will be informed when the data in the series changes
 int getDimensions()
          Quantity of dimensions in the series, i.e. the number of axis in the series A X-Y series will have dimension 2 as a Histogram series , but a X-Y-Z series will have dimension 3.

Method Detail

getName

java.lang.String getName()
Returns:
name of the series

size

int size()
Returns:
number of elements in the series

getDimensions

int getDimensions()
Quantity of dimensions in the series, i.e. the number of axis in the series A X-Y series will have dimension 2 as a Histogram series , but a X-Y-Z series will have dimension 3. The series must have at least two axis and the axis of index 0 is considered the main abscissa

Returns:
quantity of axis in the series

getValue

<C extends java.lang.Comparable<C>> C getValue(int dimension,
                                               int index)
Obtain a value for a specified axis

Type Parameters:
C - values must be comparable
Parameters:
dimension - 0 to getDimensions()-1
index - 0 to size()-1
Returns:
the value associated to an index an axis in the series.

addSeriesListener

void addSeriesListener(SeriesListener listener)
Add a series listener that will be informed when the data in the series changes

Parameters:
listener - the series listener to be informed

removeSeriesListener

void removeSeriesListener(SeriesListener listener)
Remove a series listener

Parameters:
listener - the series listener to remove
